Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Hillcrest Drive, south of the Obidian Complex.
Room.LongDescription: You can start to see the impressive Allakaren Pyramid a short distance to the southwest. The south side of the road is completely barren except for the shadow the Pyramid casts on the land. On the north, you can see the Obidian Community Housing Complex where numerous citizens live.
